actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing salary adjustments for the official reporters of debates and official reporters to committees.

summary.text: Increases the pay of the Official Reporters of Debates and Official Reporters to Committees by an amount equal to 5 percent of their present per annum gross rate of pay. Provides that such employees shall be eligible for each Federal pay comparability adjustment which becomes effective on or after January 1, 1976.

titles.title: Resolution providing salary adjustments for the official reporters of debates and official reporters to committees.
